prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a muscular man, intense cold blue eyes, short, rigid, spiky dark blue hair, wearing highly detailed and segmented Saiyan battle armor over a dark bodysuit, fierce battle expression
feature_prompt: hyperdetailed human skin texture, highly reflective metallic texture on armor, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, smooth armor, toy, doll, bright yellow hair, flat lighting, low quality
